Articles.Content:
I have been trying to add some mods to my game and got it working for a while before my game started crashing, once the game loads it immediately crashes followed by an error message. I am fairly certain all the mods I downloaded are for version 1.3.1 and I have gone into the kerbal beta tab and am running that version. Here is a screenshot of my GameData folder and I have attached the error zip via a mediafire download (couldn't find how to attach files here)

Files
You have to run the 64bit version, not the 32bit one.
